rules.name: TH_VN_IDN_SGP_IND_HKG_ARE_KOR_MYS_CHN_JPN
rules.label: TH VN IDN SGP IND HKG ARE KOR MYS CHN JPN

rules.name: FoundBothSalesAreaandPurchasingView
rules.label: Found Both Sales Area and Purchasing View

Flow.description: [01-Jul-2024] Change label for account group picklist in screen (Add-on TOPG).

formulas.name: fmlBuyer
formulas.expression: CASE({!Get_Lead.Buyer__c}, "A000", "A000 TX:Purchasing Organization", "H100", "H100 TSV:Purchasing Organization", "I100", "I100 TSR:Purchasing Organization", "S100", "S100 JSKem:Purchasing Organization", "N100", "N100 TX INDIA:Purchasing Organization", "")

formulas.name: fmlSeller
formulas.expression: CASE({!Get_Lead.Seller__c}, "2000", "2000-TOP NEXT International Company Limited", "9100", "9100-TOP SOLVENT VIETNAM", "9200", "9200-PT.TIRTA SURYA RAYA", "9300", "9300-JSKem Pte Ltd", "9400", "9400-TSChem", "")

Flow.label: Convert Lead

fields.name: ConfirmConvert
fields.fieldText:
Are you sure you want to convert this lead ?

Company Name: {!Get_Lead.Company}

TAX Number: {!Get_Lead.TAXNumber__c}

Country: {!Get_Lead.Country__r.Description__c}

fields.fieldText: Seller

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ChooseBuyer
fields.fieldText: Buyer

fields.name: Type_Of_Business_Branch2
fields.fieldText: Type Of Business (Branch)

fields.name: AccountGroup_ScreenComponent2
fields.fieldText: Account Group

fields.name: IsTOPG2
fields.fieldText: IsTOPG

fields.name: Exception_FoundRequestFormTitle
fields.fieldText:
There has account and request form in the system, cannot convert the lead.

Please see the details as below.

fields.name: Exception_FoundRequestFormAccountInfo
fields.fieldText:
Account Name: {!GetAccount.Name}

Tax Number: {!GetAccount.TaxCode1__c}

Account Group: {!GetAccount.AccountGroup__c}

fields.name: Exception_FoundRequestFormInfoCustomer
fields.fieldText:

Sales Organization: {!GetRequestForm_Customer.SalesOrganization__c}

fields.name: Exception_FoundRequestFormInfoSupplier
fields.fieldText:

Please see the details as below.

Purchasing View Number: {!GetPurchasingView.Name}

The system has already sent an email to the customer to complete the registration form.

fields.name: DoNotConvertLeadText
fields.fieldText:
You don't have authorization to convert this lead.

This lead belongs to {!Get_Lead.Owner:User.FirstName} {!Get_Lead.Owner:User.LastName}.

Please contact the administrator.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_DoNotConvertLeadText
fields.fieldText:
You don't have authorization to convert this lead.

This lead's status is unqualified.

Please contact the administrator.
